title: THDC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 40 Assistant Manager, Senior Medical Officer Posts
description: Tehri Hydro Development Corporation (THDC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 40 Assistant Manager and Senior Medical Officer Posts.
